normalized: that day, after school――
i had ended up coming to the elite building again.
the dubious rumour that i had been told by morita about the scholarship students had weighed on my mind all afternoon, and i had become unable to concentrate on anything else.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （what morita said was obviously a lie, but… hearing the details of the scholarship students' classes is part of intelligence gathering, so…）
making that excuse to myself, i was standing in front of the school building quite nonchalantly, while waiting for yukikaze to come out.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （huh…?
a stream of scholarship students emerged, accompanied by valets and maids and whatnot, but yukikaze didn't show up at all.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （i wonder if she went back before i got here…?

name: tatsurou
normalized: （where did you go… yukikaze?
since i had been told a story like that, irrational anxiety filled me.
there was no basis for thinking that anything strange was going on anywhere, so it was ridiculous to be anxious.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （shit… damn that morita…）
while cursing morita, who had told me something uncalled-for, i was looking around restlessly, when

name: tatsurou
normalized: （ah…!
yukikaze had come out from the school building.
however―or rather, as expected―that servant named inui was with her.
according to yukikaze, he seemed to be such an excellent valet that she was envied by her classmates, but it still wasn't amusing for a middle-aged man like that to stick around her constantly.
furthermore, that inui had noticed me first, and had probably told yukikaze about that.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze!
i raised my hand at yukikaze, who had looked in my direction.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （eh…?
what was with her face right now?
it seemed to say 「i've seen something disgusting.
that was my imagination, right?
inui said something to yukikaze, and then suddenly took a distance from her.
even though yukikaze had now noticed me, she didn't even try to come near, and kept frowning like she was ticked off.
she seemed to be in a pretty bad mood, and even though she had been so lively in the afternoon, she was making a tired face now, like a different person.
what was it?
had something happened?
surely not…?!

name: tatsurou
normalized: you were late in coming out, i see.
did your class drag on?
i called out, moving toward yukikaze.
however, what came back to me was a blatantly annoyed remark.

name: yukikaze
normalized: what did you come here for?

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
what for?
i was wondering how you were…

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'm no different.
don't come here all the time!
she said flatly, like she was spurning me.
she had never used such a blunt way of speaking, even when we fought, or when she was on her period.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze…?
bewildered, i was about to open my mouth, when yukikaze kept talking, as though to obstruct that.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'm saying, don't come here at every opportunity.
tatsurou is on the general course, you know?
don't you realize that it's risky just to come here?
are you stupid?
what the hell was going on?
what had happened in the period between lunchtime and now?
for yukikaze to get this angry?
had i done something again?
something so bad that yukikaze would spurn me this much?

name: tatsurou
normalized: （n, no way…?!
had she found out about the thing with shizuru-san?!
the fact that i had had sex with shizuru-san.
the fact that we had been doing it time and again.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （n, no… it doesn't mean that for sure yet.
i might have just done something to put yukikaze in a bad mood.
that would be bad, though――）

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze, did something happen?
i broached, nervously.

name: yukikaze
normalized: …hh!
yukikaze sternly glared at me.

name: yukikaze
normalized: shut up!
nothing's wrong, and i'm not tired!
we're in the middle of a mission right now, you know?!
concentrate on the mission!

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'm telling you, nothing's wrong.
can you not believe what i say?!

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze…
this was bad.
this wasn't a situation where we could talk properly at all.
yukikaze was just single-mindedly angry right now.
i didn't know whether it was because of me or not, though.
it was the first time i had felt so rejected.
time flowed by helplessly awkwardly.
yukikaze ground her back teeth.

name: yukikaze
normalized: tatsurou, what are you dawdling for?!
if you have no business with me, go back right away!

name: tatsurou
normalized: b, but…

name: yukikaze
normalized: forget it, go away!
yukikaze was tightly clenching her fist, and making her body shake.
as though she were desperately holding back her anger, which was about to erupt at any time.

name: tatsurou
normalized: understood.
sorry…
right now, i had no choice but to withdraw.
i would come see her again another time.

name: tatsurou
normalized: well, see you some other time.
if anything happens, call.

name: yukikaze
normalized: um-hmm.
yukikaze nodded, still with a scary face.
i turned my back on yukikaze, and began trudging away.
the way she was angry right now…
did yukikaze know about me and shizuru-san?
no, judging from yukikaze's personality, i had a feeling that if that were so, i wouldn't even be able to get her to listen to me.
given that, she might have been mad at me for coming here carelessly in the middle of a mission, like she said.
she had said that she wasn't tired, but no matter how i looked at her, she was pretty worn-out.
that's right.
that was undoubtedly it.
what an idiot i was, to have worried about morita's worthless nonsense and come here.
yukikaze was probably angry because she had seen through me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （shit!
what am i doing…?!
this is an important mission!
concentrate, me!
after walking a short distance, i stopped in my tracks and looked back at yukikaze, intending to at least apologize for that.
when i did――

name: yukikaze
normalized: g, go back right now!
she shouted at me as loudly as she could.
even waving her hand to shoo me away, in spite of us being so far apart.
like with a dog.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze…
i was heartbroken.
i became unable to say anything.
before i knew it, inui was waiting at yukikaze's side again.
right next to her, like a boyfriend.
yukikaze couldn't possibly be happy about that.
she was desperately enduring having a man like that inui alongside her, in order to put up the proper pretence of being a scholarship student.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （but, even if that is the case…）

name: tatsurou
normalized: （even if it is because he's her valet, he's keeping too close to her like that, isn't he?

name: tatsurou
normalized: （――tch, what am i getting jealous for?!
i just decided i would try to focus on the mission, didn't i?

name: tatsurou
normalized: （yukikaze is doing her best to endure this!
seriously, get a grip, me!
i persuaded my pathetic self, and began walking to my own post.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （i'm going to do this right, like yukikaze.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （let's stick it out together, okay, yukikaze?
at that time, i had done away with my uncalled-for jealousy.
however, the distance between yukikaze and inui really was too close.
if i had viewed that as more of a problem, then maybe…
